item.title: Getting Digitally Organized
item.description: After years of creating “photo dump” and “temp” directories to clear space on devices, I finally decided to make time to organize as many of my digital assets as best as I could. I knew I had hundreds of GB of stuff, probably closer to 2 TB. Storage Options ðŸ”—My 1TB external HDD would probably be able to store most, if not all, of my digital junk, but the USB connection has deteriorated significantly over the years, and it’s a gamble every time I plug it in as to whether or not the computer will even recognize the hard drive.
